Side zip pocketsuFaux Shearling. uAn important note on the use of a culturally appropriated term in this product description - Lucky Brand has replaced the term Sherpa with Faux Shearling as part of our company-wide effort to remove culturally appropriated designs, terms, and names from current and future products. Sherpa refers to an indigenous people native to Tibet and Nepal in the eastern Himalayas of Central Asia.

products.description: Finished in a muted floral print, UIla Johnsons Eden A-line dress showcases charming puff sleeves and a keyhole closure. The piece is finished with an asymmetric silhouette. Crewneck Short puff sleeves, tapered cuffs Back keyhole button closure Asymmetric hem 70% cotton/30% viscose Dry clean Imported SIZE & FIT About 52.25" from shoulder to hem Model measurements: 5'10" tall Model is wearing a US size 4 ABOUT THE BRAND Manhattan-based designer Ulla Johnson credits her archaeologist parents as inspiration for her namesake ready-to-wear label, founded in 1998. Natural fibers, easy fits and meticulous finishes are seen in each collection, which incorporate sweeping silhouettes, and printing and dyeing techniques from around the world. Contemporary Sportswear - Contemporary Lifestyle > Ulla Johnson > Saks Fifth Avenue > Barneys. Ulla Johnson. Color: Obsidian Botanica. Size: 10.

For everything from coffee catch-ups to client meetings, everyone needs a Jackie in her life. products.brandedName: Paige Merano Pant
products.description: The Merano Pant is our high-rise wide-leg full length trouser designed with front pleats, angled front pockets and back welt pockets. products.brandedName: Vince Camuto Printed Handkerchief-Hem Midi Dress (Plus Size)
products.description: Add a vibrant touch to your wardrobe with this eye-catching dress. Styled with a pleated halter neckline, the dress is crafted of color-blocked, floral-print fabric. It features a flattering banded waist, a floaty handkerchief hem and a button keyhole at back. Play of its bright pattern with black flared-heel pumps for a modern, architectural look. Clothing Size Guide
